title: Prometheus Bound - Deborah. H. Roberts (Hackett)
description: "This is the best Prometheus Bound in English. Deborah Roberts' translation is accurate, readable, and true to the original in idiom, imagery, and the combination of a high style with occasional colloquialism. The informative notes and perceptive Introduction will help readers to experience the play with heightened pleasure and understanding." --Seth L. Schein, Professor of Comparative Literature, University of California, Davis
